alert.note: Alert for Knox; Morrow (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:21PM EDT until July 23 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Morrow County in north central Ohio... Western Knox County in north central Ohio... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 521 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ashley to 6 miles north of Sunbury to Polaris, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mount Gilead, Cardington, Centerburg, Ashley, Chesterville, Sparta, Marengo and Fulton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
